            <event>condition.valueChanged</event>
            <event>condition.activated</event>

                <model>EmployeeProductModel</model>
                <model>AddParty_WireAuthorizedRepresentativeModel</model>

          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>models.saved</event>
            <event>models.loaded</event>
            <event>row.created</event>
            <event>row.updated</event>
            <event>condition.valueChanged</event>
            <event>condition.activated</event>

          </fields>
        </action>
      </actions>

        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="NewContactModel" label="If Mailing address same as current address">
              <formula>{{clcommon__Mailing_Address_Same_as_Current_Address__c}}</formula>
              <iftrueactions>
                <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="NewContactModel" affectedrows="context" field="MailingStreet" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{clcommon__Current_Street__c}}"/>
                <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="NewContactModel" affectedrows="context" field="MailingCity" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{clcommon__Current_City__c}}"/>
                <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="NewContactModel" affectedrows="context" field="MailingState" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{clcommon__Current_State__c}}"/>
                <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="NewContactModel" affectedrows="context" field="MailingPostalCode" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{clcommon__Current_Zip_Code__c}}"/>
                <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="NewContactModel" affectedrows="context" field="MailingCountry" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{clcommon__Current_Country__c}}"/>
              </iftrueactions>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>clcommon__Mailing_Address_Same_as_Current_Address__c</field>
          </fields>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="NewRelationship" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;

$('#newRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
$('#existingRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');

var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationModel').data[0];
var newPartyRow = newPartyModel.data[0];
if(!newPartyRow){
    var newRow = newPartyModel.createRow({
        additionalConditions: [
            { field: 'NewRelationship', value:true },
            { field: 'ExistingRelationship', value: false },
        ]
    });

     if(applicationModel.genesis__Asset_Class__c == 'Treasury Services'){

        $('#sk-89WOF-144>div>table>tr>td:nth-child(5)').addClass('hide-stepbar');
        $('#sk-89WOF-144>div>table>tr>td:nth-child(6)').addClass('hide-stepbar');
        var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');
        var relationship = skuid.page.params.Relationship;
        if(relationship === 'Business'){
         $('#businessRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
           $('#indiividualRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');
            newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyModel.data[0] ,{
                                BusinessRelationship : true ,
                                IndividualRelationship : false,
                                clcommon__Account__c : null}
        );
        }else if(relationship === 'Individual'){
             $('#businessRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');
             $('#indiividualRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
             newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyModel.data[0] ,{
                                BusinessRelationship : false,
                                IndividualRelationship : true,
                                clcommon__Account__c : null}
            );
        }
    }
}else{
     var relationship = skuid.page.params.Relationship;
     if(applicationModel.genesis__Asset_Class__c == 'Treasury Services'){
        newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyRow ,{
                            NewRelationship : true ,
                            ExistingRelationship : false,
                            clcommon__Account__c : null
                        }
        );
        if(relationship === 'Business'){
             $('#businessRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
             $('#indiividualRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');
            newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyRow ,{
                            BusinessRelationship : true ,
                            IndividualRelationship : false
                        });

        }else if(relationship === 'Individual'){
             $('#businessRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');
             $('#indiividualRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
            newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyRow ,{
                            BusinessRelationship : false ,
                            IndividualRelationship : true
                        });

        }
     }
     else{
        newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyRow ,{
                            NewRelationship : true ,
                            ExistingRelationship : false,
                            BusinessRelationship : false ,
                            IndividualRelationship : false,
                            clcommon__Account__c : null
                        }
        );
     }

}</jsitem>

$('#newRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');

var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');

var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationModel').data[0];
var newPartyRow = newPartyModel.data[0];
if(!newPartyRow){

            { field: 'NewRelationship', value:false },

        ]

   if(applicationModel.genesis__Asset_Class__c == 'Treasury Services'){

}else{

             $('#businessRelation').addClass('selected-btn');

        }else if(relationship === 'Individual'){

             $('#businessRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');

        rowUpdates['IndividualRelationship'] = false;

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="moveToStep2" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

     stepEditor.handleMessages(
         [{

}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="queryAccount" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
   $ = skuid.$;

var pageTitle = $('#errorTitle2');
var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;

var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');
var orgParameters = skuid.model.getModel('OrgParameters');

var orgParametersRow = orgParameters.data[0];

var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationModel');
var applicationRow = applicationModel.data[0];


var existingPartiesModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationParties');


var newPartyRow = newPartyModel.data[0];
//Throwing error if no option (Business Relationship / Individual Relationship) is selected
    if(!(newPartyRow.BusinessRelationship || newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship)
    || !(document.getElementById('businessRelation').classList.contains('selected-btn') || document.getElementById('indiividualRelation').classList.contains('selected-btn'))){
    editor.handleMessages(
         [{
            message: 'Please select one of the options (Business Relationship / Individual Relationship)!',
            severity: 'ERROR'
        }]
    );
    return false;
}

//fetch model and cancel any changes
var newAccountModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewAccountModel');
newAccountModel.cancel();

var newCollateralOwnersModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralOwnerModel');
newCollateralOwnersModel.cancel();

var newBIModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewBusinessInfoModel');
newBIModel.cancel();

var newPartyModelClone = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModelClone');
newPartyModelClone.cancel();

var newContactModelForExistingRel = skuid.model.getModel('NewContactModelForExistingRel');
newContactModelForExistingRel.cancel();

var newContactModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewContactModel');
newContactModel.cancel();

var addressModel = skuid.model.getModel('AddParty_Address');
addressModel.emptyData();

var employeeModel = skuid.model.getModel('AddParty_EmployeeInfoModel');
employeeModel.emptyData();

var wireAuthorizedRepresentativeModel = skuid.model.getModel('AddParty_WireAuthorizedRepresentativeModel');
wireAuthorizedRepresentativeModel.emptyData();
// validate
if(newPartyRow.ExistingRelationship){
    if(!newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c){
        var pageTitle = $('#errorTitle2');
        var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
        editor.clearMessages();
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Please select an existing account',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
        return false;
    }
    if(newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c!=null && orgParametersRow.genesis__Consolidate_Parties_with_Same_Account__c){
        var existingPartyForAccount = false; 
        
        var errorMessage = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "{{$Label.genesis__PARTY_MANAGEMENT_SAME_ACCOUNT_PARTY_NOT_ALLOWED}}");
        
        existingPartiesModel.data.forEach(function(row) {
            if(row.clcommon__Account__c == newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c){
                existingPartyForAccount = true;
            }
        });
        if(existingPartyForAccount){
            var pageTitle = $('#errorTitle2');
            var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
            editor.clearMessages();
            editor.handleMessages(
                [
                  {
                      message: errorMessage,
                      severity: 'ERROR'
                  },
                ]
            );
            return false;
        }
        
    }
    
    if(newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship) {
        var sql = "select name from contact where AccountId= '"+newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c+"'";
        result = sforce.connection.query(sql);
        if(result.size==0){
          var pageTitle = $('#errorTitle2');
          var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
          editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'No contact is associated with account, please associate a contact to this account to proceed further.',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
          );
          return false;
     }
    }
}

//fetch conditions
var accountIdCondition = newAccountModel.getConditionByName('Id');
var partyAccountIdCondition = newPartyModelClone.getConditionByName('clcommon__Account__c');
var coAccountIdCondition = newCollateralOwnersModel.getConditionByName('clcommon__Account__c');
var biIdCondition = newBIModel.getConditionByName('Id');
var newContactModelIdCondition = newContactModel.getConditionByName('AccountId');
var AddressAccIdCondition = addressModel.getConditionByName('AddressAccId');
var AddressContactIdCondition = addressModel.getConditionByName('AddressContactId');
var employeePartyAccountIdCondition = employeeModel.getConditionByName('EmployeePartyAccountId');

// set and activate condtions
if(newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c){
    newAccountModel.setCondition(accountIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
    newPartyModelClone.setCondition(partyAccountIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
    newCollateralOwnersModel.setCondition(coAccountIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
    newContactModel.setCondition(newContactModelIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
    addressModel.setCondition(AddressAccIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
    addressModel.setCondition(AddressContactIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
    skuid.model.updateData([addressModel],function(){});
    employeeModel.setCondition(employeePartyAccountIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
}else{
    newAccountModel.setCondition(accountIdCondition,'');
    newPartyModelClone.setCondition(partyAccountIdCondition,'');
    newCollateralOwnersModel.setCondition(coAccountIdCondition,'');
    newContactModel.setCondition(newContactModelIdCondition,'');
    employeeModel.setCondition(employeePartyAccountIdCondition,'');
}

//query models
skuid.model.updateData([newAccountModel, newCollateralOwnersModel, newPartyModelClone, newContactModelForExistingRel, newContactModel, employeeModel, wireAuthorizedRepresentativeModel],function(){
    createNewAccountRow(newAccountModel);
    createNewCORow(newCollateralOwnersModel);
    createNewContactRow(newContactModel);
    createNewEIRow(employeeModel);
    createNewAuthRepRow(wireAuthorizedRepresentativeModel);
    if(!newPartyRow.NewRelationship && newPartyModelClone.data && newPartyModelClone.data.length == 1){

    }else{
        newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyRow,{
                                    clcommon__Type__c: null,
                                    clcommon__Signer_Capacity__c : null,
                                    clcommon__Signing_on_Behalf_of__c : null,
                                });
    }

    if(skuid.page.params.wireFinAcc) {
        employeeModel.updateRow(employeeModel.data[0],{
                                    genesis__Is_Authorized_Representative__c: true,
                                });
    }


    //query bi for account
    if(newAccountModel.data && newAccountModel.data.length > 0 && newAccountModel.data[0].genesis__Business_Information__c){
        newBIModel.setCondition(biIdCondition,newAccountModel.data[0].genesis__Business_Information__c);
    }else{
        newBIModel.setCondition(biIdCondition,''); 
        //CUSTOM STARTS
        //newBIModel.setCondition(biIdCondition,newAccountModel.data[0].genesis__Business_Information__c);
        //CUSTOM ENDS
    }

    skuid.model.updateData([newBIModel],function(){
        createNewBIRow(newBIModel);
        moveToNextStepPls();
    });
});


function createNewAccountRow(newAccountModel){
    if(newAccountModel.data && newAccountModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = newAccountModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'BusinessRelationship', value:true },
                { field: 'IndividualRelationship', value:false },
                //{ field: 'Name', value:'Set Account Name' },
            ]
        });
    }
}

function createNewContactRow(newContactModel){
    if(newContactModel.data && newContactModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = newContactModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'BusinessRelationship', value:false },
                { field: 'IndividualRelationship', value:true }

            ]
        });
    }
}

function createNewCORow(newCollateralOwnersModel){
    if(newCollateralOwnersModel.data && newCollateralOwnersModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = newCollateralOwnersModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'clcommon__Ownership__c', value: 100 },
                { field: 'clcommon__Collateral__c', value: null},
            ]
        });
    }
}

function createNewBIRow(newBIModel){
    if(newBIModel.data && newBIModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = newBIModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                //{ field: 'genesis__Business_Legal_Name__c', value:'Set Business Info' },
            ]
        });
    }
}

function createNewEIRow(newEIModel){
	if(newEIModel.data && newEIModel.data.length < 1){
        if(skuid.page.params.wireFinAcc) {
            var newRow = newEIModel.createRow({
                additionalConditions: [
                    { field: 'genesis__Is_Authorized_Representative__c', value: true },
                ]
            });
        }
        else {
            var newRow = newEIModel.createRow({
                additionalConditions: [
                    { field: 'genesis__Is_Administrator__c', value: true },
                ]
            });
        }
    }
}

function createNewAuthRepRow(wireAuthorizedRepresentativeModel){
    if(wireAuthorizedRepresentativeModel.data && wireAuthorizedRepresentativeModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = wireAuthorizedRepresentativeModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                //add any default field value assignment, if required.
            ]
        });
    }
}

function moveToNextStepPls(){
    var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
    var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];
    currentStep.navigate('step3');
}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="moveToStep4" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  step = params.step,
    stepEditor = step.editor,
    $ = skuid.$;
stepEditor.clearMessages();
var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');
var newPartyRow = newPartyModel.data[0];
var models;

var addressModel = skuid.model.getModel('AddParty_Address');
var customSettingsModel = skuid.model.getModel('CLPlatformCustomSettings');
var customSettingsRow = customSettingsModel.data[0];

var pageTitle = $('#errorTitle3');
var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();
if(newPartyRow.BusinessRelationship){
    models = [
        skuid.model.getModel("NewAccountModel"),
        skuid.model.getModel("NewBusinessInfoModel")
    ];
}else{
    models = [
        skuid.model.getModel("NewContactModel"),
        skuid.model.getModel("NewBusinessInfoModel")
    ];
}
var contactMdl = skuid.model.getModel("NewContactModel");
contactRow = contactMdl.data[0];
let moveToNextStep = true;
if(contactRow&&newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship){
    let birthDate = contactRow.Birthdate;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());
    
    //Remove birth date check by SUBHAM ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    /*
    if (birthDate === '' || birthDate === null || birthDate === undefined || birthDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages(

             [{
                message: 'BirthDate cannot be future date or blank.',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );

        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }
    */
    //Remove birth date check by SUBHAM ------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    if(!(customSettingsRow.clcommon__Copy_Common_Address_To_Standard_Address__c) && (contactRow.clcommon__Years_At_Current_Address__c === undefined||contactRow.clcommon__Years_At_Current_Address__c<1)||(contactRow.clcommon__Years_At_Current_Address__c==1&&(contactRow.clcommon__Months_at_current_address__c<=0||contactRow.clcommon__Months_at_current_address__c===undefined )))
    {
        //custom comments-----
        // if(!(contactRow.OtherStreet&&contactRow.OtherCity&&contactRow.OtherState&&contactRow.OtherPostalCode&&contactRow.OtherCountry))
        // {
        //     stepEditor.handleMessages(
        //         [
        //           {
        //               message: 'Previous address cannot be blank',
        //               severity: 'ERROR'
        //           },
        //         ]
        //     );
        //     moveToNextStep = false;
        //     return false;
        // }
        //custom comments-----
    }
    //There can be parties with no email ----- Custom added by Subham - 7th Feb 2023---------------------
    // if(!contactRow.Email || contactRow.Email ==="")
    // {
    //     stepEditor.handleMessages(
    //         [
    //           {
    //               message: 'Please capture e-mail ID of the customer',
    //               severity: 'ERROR'
    //           },
    //         ]
    //     );
    //     moveToNextStep = false;
    //     return false;
    // }
    //There can be parties with no email ----- Custom added by Subham - 7th Feb 2023---------------------
}
if((customSettingsRow.clcommon__Copy_Common_Address_To_Standard_Address__c)) {
    var invalidPreviousAddress = false;

    var addressCount = new Map([
        ['BillingAddress', 0],
        ['ShippingAddress', 0],
        ['CurrentAddress', 0],
        ['MailingAddress', 0]
    ]);

    var missingStartDate = false;
    var missingEndDate = false;

    // Additionally, start date must be less than end date.
    var invalidDateRange = false;

    // False, iff, any of the previous address' date range are overlapping.
    var hasOverlappingPrevAddressDateRange = false;

    // False, iff, any of the previous address' date range are overlapping with teh current address.
    var hasOverlappingCurrInPrevAddressDateRange = false;

    var currentAddressStartDate, currentAddressEndDate, previousAddress;

    // Stores the epoch for each previous address' start & end date.
    var prevAddressDateRangeList = [];

    // Comparator to sort the 'prevAddressDateRangeList' array. This is needed to optimise validations at #204.
    var startTimeComparatorFn = function(a, b) {
     if (a.startDateEpoch === b.startDateEpoch) {
        return a.endDateEpoch - b.endDateEpoch;
      }
      return a.startDateEpoch - b.startDateEpoch;
    }

    addressModel.data.some(function(row, i){
        // Validate Date range
        if (!row.clcommon__Start_Date__c && row.clcommon__End_Date__c) {
          missingStartDate = true;
          return true;
        }

        else if (row.clcommon__Start_Date__c && !row.clcommon__End_Date__c) {
          missingEndDate = true;
          return true;
        }

        else {
            if ((row.clcommon__Start_Date__c && row.clcommon__End_Date__c) &&
                (row.clcommon__Start_Date__c > row.clcommon__End_Date__c)) {
                invalidDateRange = true;
                return true;
            }
        }

        if (row.clcommon__Previous_Address__c) {
            previousAddress = row;
            if (row.clcommon__Current_Address__c || row.clcommon__Mailing_Address__c) {
              invalidPreviousAddress = true;
              return true;
            }

            // Populate date ranges within prev address for running validations later.
            if (previousAddress.clcommon__Start_Date__c && previousAddress.clcommon__End_Date__c) {
              let startDateEpoch = new Date(previousAddress.clcommon__Start_Date__c).valueOf();
              let endDateEpoch = new Date(previousAddress.clcommon__End_Date__c).valueOf();

              prevAddressDateRangeList.push({
                startDateEpoch: startDateEpoch,
                endDateEpoch: endDateEpoch
              });
          }
        }
        if (row.clcommon__Current_Address__c) {
            currentAddressStartDate = row.clcommon__Start_Date__c;
            currentAddressEndDate = row.clcommon__End_Date__c;
            addressCount.set('CurrentAddress', addressCount.get('CurrentAddress')+1);
        }
        if (row.clcommon__Mailing_Address__c) {
            addressCount.set('MailingAddress', addressCount.get('MailingAddress')+1);
        }
        if (row.clcommon__Billing_Address__c) {
            addressCount.set('BillingAddress', addressCount.get('BillingAddress')+1);
        }
        if (row.clcommon__Shipping_Address__c) {
            addressCount.set('ShippingAddress', addressCount.get('ShippingAddress')+1);
        }

    });

    // Validate date ranges for any over lap in previous addresses.
    if (prevAddressDateRangeList.length) {
      prevAddressDateRangeList = prevAddressDateRangeList.sort(startTimeComparatorFn);
      let currentAddressStartDateEpoch, currentAddressEndDateEpoch;

      if (currentAddressStartDate && currentAddressEndDate) {
        currentAddressStartDateEpoch = new Date(currentAddressStartDate).valueOf();
        currentAddressEndDateEpoch = new Date(currentAddressEndDate).valueOf();
      }

      for (let i = 0; i < prevAddressDateRangeList.length; i++) {
        if ((i < prevAddressDateRangeList.length - 1) &&
            (prevAddressDateRangeList[i].endDateEpoch >= prevAddressDateRangeList[i+1].startDateEpoch)) {
          hasOverlappingPrevAddressDateRange = true;
          break;
        }

        // Validate date ranges for any over lap of current address with previous addresses.
        if (currentAddressStartDateEpoch && currentAddressEndDateEpoch) {
          if (!(currentAddressStartDateEpoch > prevAddressDateRangeList[i].endDateEpoch ||
            currentAddressEndDateEpoch < prevAddressDateRangeList[i].startDateEpoch)) {
              hasOverlappingCurrInPrevAddressDateRange = true;
              break;
          }
        }
      }
    }

    /**
     * Handle error clauses.
     */
    if (addressCount.get('CurrentAddress') > 1 || addressCount.get('MailingAddress') > 1 || addressCount.get('BillingAddress') > 1 || addressCount.get('ShippingAddress') > 1) {
      return handleErrorAndBlockStepper(stepEditor, 'Duplicate Address Found!');
    }

    if (invalidPreviousAddress) {
      return handleErrorAndBlockStepper(editor, 'Previous Address can\'t be selected with any other address type');
    }

    if (missingStartDate) {
      return handleErrorAndBlockStepper(editor, 'Start date must be defined if end date is defined.');
    }

    if (missingEndDate) {
      return handleErrorAndBlockStepper(editor, 'End date must be defined if start date is defined.');
    }

    if (invalidDateRange) {
      return handleErrorAndBlockStepper(editor, 'Start date must be less than end date.');
    }

    if (hasOverlappingPrevAddressDateRange) {
      return handleErrorAndBlockStepper(editor, 'Date range within the listed previous adddresses should not overlap.');
    }

    if (hasOverlappingCurrInPrevAddressDateRange) {
      return handleErrorAndBlockStepper(editor, 'Date range within the listed previous adddresses should not overlap with the current address.');
    }

    const date1 = new Date(currentAddressStartDate);
    const date2 = new Date(currentAddressEndDate);
    const diffTime = Math.abs(date2 - date1);
    const diffDays = Math.ceil(diffTime / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
    if (diffDays < 731) {
        //Custom comment------
        // if (previousAddress === undefined || !(previousAddress.clcommon__Street_Address__c && previousAddress.clcommon__City__c && previousAddress.clcommon__State_Province__c && previousAddress.clcommon__Zip_Code__c && previousAddress.clcommon__Country__c)) {
        //     editor.handleMessages(
        //         [{
        //             message: 'Previous address cannot be blank',
        //             severity: 'ERROR'
        //         }, ]
        //     );
        //     moveToNextStep = false;
        //     return false;
        // }
        //Custom comment------
    }
}
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationModel');
var parentAccountModel = skuid.model.getModel('TreasuryParentAccountModel');
var applicationRow = applicationModel.data[0];
var productApplicationId = skuid.page.params.productAppId;

if(!moveToNextStep)
    return false;

if(contactMdl.data[0]){
    if(contactMdl.data[0].Email  || skuid.model.getModel("NewBusinessInfoModel").data[0].Email){
        $("#consentTitle .nx-error").hide();
    }else{
        $("#consentTitle .nx-error").show();
    }
}

if( skuid.page.params.sourcePage == 'TreasurySweepServicePage'){
    var employeeInfoModel = skuid.model.getModel('AddParty_EmployeeInfoModel');
    employeeInfoModel.updateRow(employeeInfoModel.getFirstRow(),{genesis__Sweep_Contact__c: true});
    
}

if((applicationModel.data[0].genesis__Asset_Class__c == 'Treasury Services') && (newPartyModel.data[0].IndividualRelationship)){
        //for individual party add parent company to it
        newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyModel.getFirstRow(),{genesis__Parent_Company__c : parentAccountModel.data[0].Id});
        newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyModel.getFirstRow(),{parentCompanyName : parentAccountModel.data[0].Name});
 }

var vres = validateAllRequiredFields($,editor,models);
if(!vres){
    return vres;
}

/**
 * Helper method to handle error.
 */
function handleErrorAndBlockStepper(formEditor, errMessage) {
  formEditor.handleMessages(
    [{
        message: errMessage,
        severity: 'ERROR'
    }]
  );
  moveToNextStep = false;
  return false;
}</jsitem>

if(customSetting.clcommon__Copy_Common_Address_To_Standard_Address__c) {
    //Deleting address rows marked for deletion on the UI
    addressModel.data.forEach(function(row) {
        if(addressModel.isRowMarkedForDeletion(row) == true) {
            //The records just added in the UI but not saved in dB have ID starting with 'Sk-'
            //Hence, putting this check to delete the address row from dB, if that address exists in dB
            if(!(row.Id.startsWith('sk-'))) {
                var addressToDelete = new sforce.SObject("clcommon__Address__c");
                addressToDelete.Id = row.Id;
                var delResult = sforce.connection.deleteIds([addressToDelete.Id]);
                if(delResult[0].getBoolean("success")) {
                    addressModel.abandonRow(row);
                }
                else {
                    console.log("failed to delete address " + delResult[0]);
                }
            }
            else {
                addressModel.abandonRow(row);
            }
            //Deleting address values from account/contact which were copied from the addressModel
            //row (because of custom setting - clcommon__Copy_Common_Address_To_Standard_Address__c being true )
            if(row.clcommon__Billing_Address__c) {
                newAccountRow.BillingCity = null;
                newAccountRow.BillingCountry = null;
                newAccountRow.BillingStreet = null;
                newAccountRow.BillingState = null;
                newAccountRow.BillingPostalCode = null;

                newAccountRow.ShippingCountry = null;
                newAccountRow.ShippingStreet = null;
                newAccountRow.ShippingState = null;
                newAccountRow.ShippingPostalCode = null;
            }
            if(row.clcommon__Mailing_Address__c) {
                newContactRow.MailingCity = null;
                newContactRow.MailingCountry = null;
                newContactRow.MailingStreet = null;
                newContactRow.MailingState = null;
                newContactRow.MailingPostalCode = null;
            }
            if(row.clcommon__Current_Address__c) {
                newContactRow.clcommon__Current_City__c = null;
                newContactRow.clcommon__Current_Country__c = null;
                newContactRow.clcommon__Current_Street__c = null;
                newContactRow.clcommon__Current_State__c = null;
                newContactRow.clcommon__Current_Zip_Code__c = null;
            }

	        }

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="partyTypeAssign">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var PartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('PartyMultiselectModel');
var newPartyRow = PartyModel.data[0]; 

var partyIds= newPartyRow.MultiSelect;
var PartyTypeModel = skuid.model.getModel('PartyTypeModel');
var newPartyTypweRow = PartyTypeModel.data; 
var partyIdToNameMap = new Map();

var FieldsDisplayModel = skuid.model.getModel('FieldsDisplayModel');
var FieldDisplayModelRow = FieldsDisplayModel.getFirstRow();
$.each(PartyTypeModel.getRows(),function(i,row){
            partyIdToNameMap.set(row.Id, row.Name);
            });
//related Business Entity map of ID and Related Business Entity
var relatedBusinessEntityMap = new Map();
$.each(PartyTypeModel.getRows(),function(i,row){
            relatedBusinessEntityMap.set(row.Id, row.clcommon__Related_Business_Entity__c);
            });
            
//related Individual map of ID and Related Business Entity
var relatedIndividualMap = new Map();
$.each(PartyTypeModel.getRows(),function(i,row){
            relatedIndividualMap.set(row.Id, row.clcommon__Related_Individual__c);
            });
            
var partyIdssplit= partyIds.split(';'); // splitting the string with selected ids
FieldDisplayModelRow.BeneficialOwnerUICheck = false;
FieldDisplayModelRow.SignerFieldUICheck = false;
//display logic for fields related to party type.
for(i=0;i<partyIdssplit.length;i++){
    if((partyIdToNameMap.get(partyIdssplit[i])==="BENEFICIAL OWNER" ) ){
        FieldDisplayModelRow.BeneficialOwnerUICheck = true;
    } 
    if(partyIdToNameMap.get(partyIdssplit[i])==="SIGNER" ){
        FieldDisplayModelRow.SignerFieldUICheck = true;
    }
    /*{
        FieldDisplayModelRow.BeneficialOwnerUICheck = false;
        FieldDisplayModelRow.SignerFieldUICheck = false;
    }*/
    
}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateACHNameWireName" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
function errorMessage(errMessage){
    var pageTitle = $('#errorTitle3');
    var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
    editor.clearMessages();
    editor.handleMessages(
    [{
        message: errMessage,
        severity: 'ERROR'
    }]
  );
}
    var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationModel');
    var applicationRow = applicationModel.data[0];

if(applicationRow.genesis__Asset_Class__c == 'Treasury Services'){

    var businessInfoModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewBusinessInfoModel');
    var businessInfoRow = businessInfoModel.data[0];

    var regex = /^[A-Za-z0-9 ]+$/;
    var sourcepage=skuid.page.params.sourcePage;
    if(skuid.page.params.sourcePage == 'TreasuryACHPage')
    {
        if(!businessInfoRow.genesis__ACH_Name__c)
        {
            errorMessage('Required Fields have no Value [ACH Name]');
            return false;
        }
        else if(!regex.test(businessInfoRow.genesis__ACH_Name__c.trim()))
        {
            errorMessage('Special Characters are not allowed in ACH Name');
            return false;
        }
    }
    else if(skuid.page.params.sourcePage == 'TreasuryWiresPage' ){
        if(!businessInfoRow.genesis__Wire_Name__c ){
            errorMessage('Required Fields have no Value [Wire Name]');
            return false;
        }
        else if(!regex.test(businessInfoRow.genesis__Wire_Name__c.trim()))
        {
            errorMessage('Special Characters are not allowed in Wire Name');
            return false;
        }
    }
}


return true;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validatePartyType" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
  step = params.step,
    stepEditor = step.editor,
stepEditor.clearMessages();
var pageTitle = $('#errorStep4');
var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
var PartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('PartyMultiselectModel');
var newPartyRow = PartyModel.data[0];
var multiSelectPicklist=newPartyRow.MultiSelect;
var PartyTypeModel = skuid.model.getModel('PartyTypeModel');
var newPartyTypweRow = PartyTypeModel.data;
var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');
var newPartyModelRow = newPartyModel.data[0];
var fieldValidationMap = new Map();

$.each(PartyTypeModel.getRows(),function(i,row){
            fieldValidationMap.set(row.Id, row.Name);
            });

var isBorrowerPresent =0; // flag for checking if multiselect picklist contains BORROWER
var isCoBorrowerPresent =0; //flag for checking if multiselect picklist contains CO-BORROWER
var isGuarantorPresent =0; //flag for checking if multiselect picklist contains SIGNER
var isLessePresent =0; //flag for checking if multiselect picklist contains LESSE
let moveToNextStep = true;
var splitMultiSelectPicklist= multiSelectPicklist.split(';'); // splitting the string with selected ids from multiselect picklist
for(i=0;i<splitMultiSelectPicklist.length;i++){
    if(fieldValidationMap.get(splitMultiSelectPicklist[i])==="BORROWER"){
        isBorrowerPresent =1;
    }else if(fieldValidationMap.get(splitMultiSelectPicklist[i])==="CO-BORROWER"){
        isCoBorrowerPresent =1;
    }else if(fieldValidationMap.get(splitMultiSelectPicklist[i])==="GUARANTOR"){
        isGuarantorPresent =1;
    }else if(fieldValidationMap.get(splitMultiSelectPicklist[i])==="LESSE"){
        isLessePresent =1;
    }
}
$.unblockUI();
var message1 = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "{{$Label.genesis__PARTY_MANAGEMENT_CHECK_PARTY_TYPE}}");
if((isBorrowerPresent && isCoBorrowerPresent)||(isCoBorrowerPresent && isGuarantorPresent)||(isBorrowerPresent && isGuarantorPresent) ||(isBorrowerPresent && isLessePresent)|| (isCoBorrowerPresent && isLessePresent) || (isGuarantorPresent && isLessePresent)||(isBorrowerPresent && isCoBorrowerPresent && isGuarantorPresent && isLessePresent) ||(isBorrowerPresent && isCoBorrowerPresent && isGuarantorPresent) || (isCoBorrowerPresent && isGuarantorPresent && flag4) && (isBorrowerPresent && isGuarantorPresent && isLessePresent) ){
    stepEditor.handleMessages(
         [{
            message: message1,
            severity: 'ERROR'
        }]
    );
        moveToNextStep= false;
        return false;
    
}
var message2 = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "{{$Label.genesis__PARTY_MANAGEMENT_OWNERSHIP_PERCENTAGE_VALIDATION}}");
if(newPartyModelRow.clcommon__Percent_Ownership__c > 100){
    stepEditor.handleMessages(
         [{
            message: message2,
            severity: 'ERROR'
        }]
    );
        moveToNextStep= false;
        return false;
    
}</jsitem>

    }
}

$.each(RelatedIndividualAndEntityModel.getRows(),function(i,row){

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="OpenGeocode" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var executionPriority = "1";
var partyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NGParty');
var party = partyModel.data[0];
var title = 'Geocode for '+party.clcommon__Account__r.Name;
var appId = party.genesis__Application__c;
var borrowerId;
    if(party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name =='Corporation' || 
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Limited Liability Company' ||
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Partnership' ||
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Association' ||
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Trust' ||
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Government')
    {
         borrowerId = party.clcommon__Account__c;
    }
   else if(party.clcommon__Contact__c && (party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name =='Individual' || 
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Sole Proprietorship') )
    {
         borrowerId = party.clcommon__Contact__c;
    }else{
        borrowerId = party.clcommon__Account__c;
    }
var retVal = sforce.apex.execute('intframework.IntegrationWebService','getIntegrationUIInformation',{
   integrationFamily :  "Geocoding",
   apiType : "Geocoding",
   executionPriority : executionPriority
});
var jsonObject = JSON.parse(retVal);
var skuidPage= jsonObject.apiSpecificUIPageName;
var iframeUrl = '/apex/skuid__ui?page=' + skuidPage + '&appId=' + appId +'&borrowerId='+borrowerId;
openTopLevelDialog({
    title: title,
    iframeUrl: iframeUrl
});

}

      <cssitem location="inline" name="CreditDisplay" cachelocation="false">#credit-score-number-view {
    width: 100%;
    text-align: right;
    margin-top: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    line-height: 70px;
}

#credit-score-number-view .credit-score-bg {
    margin: 0 auto;
    font-size: 48px;
    color: white;
    background-color: #48CE94;
    padding-left: 12px;
    padding-right: 12px;
    display: inline-block;
    height: 70px;
    border-radius: 5px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}

#credit-score-simple-view {
    margin-top: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    margin-left: 15px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .nx-editor-header,
#credit-score-simple-view .nx-editor-contents {
    margin: 0;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .nx-item {
    white-space: nowrap;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .credit-score-row {
    height: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    line-height: 20px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .credit-score-row .credit-score-value {
    background-color: #7F7F7F;
    color: white;
    font-size: 11px;
    padding-left: 10px;
    padding-right: 10px;
    margin-right: 5px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    display: inline-block;
    height: 20px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .credit-score-row .credit-score-type {
    display: inline-block;
    height: 20px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .nx-list-footer {
    display: none;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry {
    background-color: #1CBDD4;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    margin-left: 10px;
    padding: 5px 12px;
    border-radius: 5px;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry .nx-basicfieldeditor-item-label {
    width: 80%;
    color: white;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry .nx-field {
    width: 20%;
    text-align: right;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry .nx-field .nx-fieldtext {
    background-color: white;
    color: #1CBDD4;
    width: 20px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    text-align: center;
    display: inline-block;
    font-weight: 700;
}

#credit-score-figure {
    position: relative;
    height: 60px;
}

#credit-score-figure .credit-score-colorbar {
    position: absolute;
    top: 10px;
    left: 15px;
    bottom: 30px;
    right: 0;
    background-color: red;
}

#credit-score-figure .credit-score-colorbar-tick {
    position: absolute;
    height: 25px;
    width: 4px;
    border: 1px solid #7F7F7F;
    display: inline-block;
}

#credit-score-figure .credit-score-number-sm {
    position: absolute;
    background-color: #2D5074;
    color: white;
    font-size: 11px;
    padding: 3px 10px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    display: inline-block;
}

#credit-score-bar-wrapper {
    margin-left: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.backgroundColorWhite {
    background-color : white;
}
#jointConsent .nx-editor-header {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 1px;
}</cssitem>

#partyDetailPageId .sk-dropnav, div.sk-navigation.sk-navigation-dropdown {

}

.shift-arrow-to-left{
        padding-right: 40px !important;
}

#partyDetailPageId .ui-button.iconic-button.iconic-button-delete{

}

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="commonUtils.js">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="clsRemoteActions.js">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="UpdateParty" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var pageTitle = $('#EditPartyTitlePanel');
var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();
/*
    Handle error messages

    For printing error messages: use return functionName() as syntax
    For printing non error(INFO,WARNING) messages: use functionName() as syntax without any 'return' preceding function name
*/
var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {

    if(severity === 'ERROR') {
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: message,
                severity: severity.toUpperCase()
            }
        ]);
        $.unblockUI();
        return false;
    } else {
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: message,
                severity: severity.toUpperCase()
            }
        ]);
        $.unblockUI();
        return true;
    }
};


var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGParty');
var newPartyRow = newPartyModel.data[0];



var newAccountModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGPartyAccount');
var newAccountRow = newAccountModel.data[0];

var newContactModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGPartyContact');
var newContactRow = newContactModel.data[0];

var addressModel  = skuid.model.getModel('EditParty_Address');

var customSettingsModel = skuid.model.getModel('CLPlatformCustomSettings');
var customSettingsRow = customSettingsModel.data[0];
 
 var addressModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditParty_Address');
var addressRow = addressModel.data[0];

if(newContactRow) {
    let birthDate = newContactRow.Birthdate;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());
    
    /*if (birthDate === '' || birthDate === null || birthDate === undefined || birthDate>today ) {
        return displayMessage('BirthDate cannot be future date or blank.','ERROR');
    }
    if(!newContactRow.Email || newContactRow.Email ==="") {
        return displayMessage('Please capture e-mail ID of the customer','ERROR');
    }
    if(!(customSettingsRow.clcommon__Copy_Common_Address_To_Standard_Address__c) && (newContactRow.clcommon__Years_At_Current_Address__c === undefined||newContactRow.clcommon__Years_At_Current_Address__c<1)||(newContactRow.clcommon__Years_At_Current_Address__c==1&&(newContactRow.clcommon__Months_at_current_address__c<=0||newContactRow.clcommon__Months_at_current_address__c===undefined ))) {
        if(!(newContactRow.OtherStreet&&newContactRow.OtherCity&&newContactRow.OtherState&&newContactRow.OtherPostalCode&&newContactRow.OtherCountry)) {
            return displayMessage('Previous address cannot be blank', 'ERROR');
        }
    }*/
}

//Address validations
if(customSettingsRow.clcommon__Copy_Common_Address_To_Standard_Address__c) {
    //Deleting address rows marked for deletion on the UI
    addressModel.data.forEach(function(row) {
        if(addressModel.isRowMarkedForDeletion(row) == true) {
            //The records just added in the UI but not saved in dB have ID starting with 'Sk-'
            //Hence, putting this check to delete the address row from dB, if that address exists in dB
            if(!(row.Id.startsWith('sk-'))) {
                var addressToDelete = new sforce.SObject("clcommon__Address__c"); 
                addressToDelete.Id = row.Id;
                var delResult = sforce.connection.deleteIds([addressToDelete.Id]);
                if(delResult[0].getBoolean("success")) {
                    addressModel.abandonRow(row);
                } 
                else {
                    console.log("failed to delete address " + delResult[0]);
                }   
            }
            else {
                addressModel.abandonRow(row);
            }
            //Deleting address values from account/contact which were copied from the addressModel
            //row (because of custom setting - clcommon__Copy_Common_Address_To_Standard_Address__c being true )
            if(row.clcommon__Billing_Address__c) {
                newAccountRow.BillingCity = null;
                newAccountRow.BillingCountry = null;
                newAccountRow.BillingStreet = null;
                newAccountRow.BillingState = null;
                newAccountRow.BillingPostalCode = null;
            }
            if(row.clcommon__Shipping_Address__c) {
                newAccountRow.ShippingCity = null;
                newAccountRow.ShippingCountry = null;
                newAccountRow.ShippingStreet = null;
                newAccountRow.ShippingState = null;
                newAccountRow.ShippingPostalCode = null;
            }
            if(row.clcommon__Mailing_Address__c) {
                newContactRow.MailingCity = null;
                newContactRow.MailingCountry = null;
                newContactRow.MailingStreet = null;
                newContactRow.MailingState = null;
                newContactRow.MailingPostalCode = null;
            }
            if(row.clcommon__Current_Address__c) {
                newContactRow.clcommon__Current_City__c = null;
                newContactRow.clcommon__Current_Country__c = null;
                newContactRow.clcommon__Current_Street__c = null;
                newContactRow.clcommon__Current_State__c = null;
                newContactRow.clcommon__Current_Zip_Code__c = null;
            }
            if(row.clcommon__Previous_Address__c) {
                newContactRow.OtherCity = null;
                newContactRow.OtherCountry = null;
                newContactRow.OtherStreet = null;
                newContactRow.OtherState = null;
                newContactRow.OtherPostalCode = null;
            }
        }
    });
    var invalidPreviousAddress = false;
    var missingStartDate = false;
    var missingEndDate = false;

    // Additionally, start date must be less than end date.
    var invalidDateRange = false;

    // False, iff, any of the previous address' date range are overlapping.
    var hasOverlappingPrevAddressDateRange = false;

    // False, iff, any of the previous address' date range are overlapping with teh current address.
    var hasOverlappingCurrInPrevAddressDateRange = false;

    var currentAddressStartDate, currentAddressEndDate, previousAddress;

    // Stores the epoch for each previous address' start & end date.
    var prevAddressDateRangeList = [];

    // Comparator to sort the 'prevAddressDateRangeList' array. This is needed to optimise validations at #204.
    var startTimeComparatorFn = function(a, b) {
      if (a.startDateEpoch === b.startDateEpoch) {
        return a.endDateEpoch - b.endDateEpoch;
      }
      return a.startDateEpoch - b.startDateEpoch;
    }
   
    addressModel.data.some(function(row, i){
        // Validate Date range
        if (!row.clcommon__Start_Date__c && row.clcommon__End_Date__c) {
          missingStartDate = true;
          return true;
        }

        else if (row.clcommon__Start_Date__c && !row.clcommon__End_Date__c) {
          missingEndDate = true;
          return true;
        }

        else {
            if ((row.clcommon__Start_Date__c && row.clcommon__End_Date__c) &&
                (row.clcommon__Start_Date__c > row.clcommon__End_Date__c)) {
                invalidDateRange = true;
                return true;
            }
        }
        if (row.clcommon__Previous_Address__c) {
            previousAddress = row;
            if (row.clcommon__Current_Address__c || row.clcommon__Mailing_Address__c) {
                invalidPreviousAddress = true;
                return true;
            }

            // Populate date ranges within prev address for running validations later.
            if (previousAddress.clcommon__Start_Date__c && previousAddress.clcommon__End_Date__c) {
              let startDateEpoch = new Date(previousAddress.clcommon__Start_Date__c).valueOf();
              let endDateEpoch = new Date(previousAddress.clcommon__End_Date__c).valueOf();

              prevAddressDateRangeList.push({
                startDateEpoch: startDateEpoch,
                endDateEpoch: endDateEpoch
              });
            }
        }
        if (row.clcommon__Current_Address__c) {
            currentAddressStartDate = row.clcommon__Start_Date__c;
            currentAddressEndDate = row.clcommon__End_Date__c;
        }
    });

    // Validate date ranges for any over lap in previous addresses.
    if (prevAddressDateRangeList.length) {
      prevAddressDateRangeList = prevAddressDateRangeList.sort(startTimeComparatorFn);
      let currentAddressStartDateEpoch, currentAddressEndDateEpoch;

      if (currentAddressStartDate && currentAddressEndDate) {
        currentAddressStartDateEpoch = new Date(currentAddressStartDate).valueOf();
        currentAddressEndDateEpoch = new Date(currentAddressEndDate).valueOf();
      }

      for (let i = 0; i < prevAddressDateRangeList.length; i++) {
        if ((i < prevAddressDateRangeList.length - 1) && 
            (prevAddressDateRangeList[i].endDateEpoch >= prevAddressDateRangeList[i+1].startDateEpoch)) {
          hasOverlappingPrevAddressDateRange = true;
          break;
        }

        // Validate date ranges for any over lap of current address with previous addresses.
        if (currentAddressStartDateEpoch && currentAddressEndDateEpoch) {
          if (!(currentAddressStartDateEpoch > prevAddressDateRangeList[i].endDateEpoch ||
            currentAddressEndDateEpoch < prevAddressDateRangeList[i].startDateEpoch)) {
              hasOverlappingCurrInPrevAddressDateRange = true;
              break;
          }
        }
      }
    }

    if (invalidPreviousAddress) {
      return displayMessage('Previous Address can\'t be selected with any other address type', 'ERROR');
    }

    if (missingStartDate) {
      return displayMessage('Start date must be defined if end date is defined.', 'ERROR');
    }

    if (missingEndDate) {
      return displayMessage('End date must be defined if start date is defined.', 'ERROR');
    }

    if (invalidDateRange) {
      return displayMessage('Start date must be less than end date.', 'ERROR');
    }

    if (hasOverlappingPrevAddressDateRange) {
      return displayMessage('Date range within the listed previous adddresses should not overlap.', 'ERROR');
    }

    if (hasOverlappingCurrInPrevAddressDateRange) {
      return displayMessage('Date range within the listed previous adddresses should not overlap with the current address.', 'ERROR');
    }

    const date1 = new Date(currentAddressStartDate);
    const date2 = new Date(currentAddressEndDate);
    const diffTime = Math.abs(date2 - date1);
    const diffDays = Math.ceil(diffTime / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)); 
    var previousAddressMessage = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "{{$Label.genesis__Previous_Address_Check}}");
    if(diffDays < 731) {
        if(previousAddress === undefined || !(previousAddress.clcommon__Street_Address__c && previousAddress.clcommon__Address_Line_2__c && previousAddress.clcommon__City__c && previousAddress.clcommon__State_Province__c && previousAddress.clcommon__Zip_Code__c && previousAddress.clcommon__Country__c))
        {
            editor.handleMessages(
                [
                {
                    message: previousAddressMessage,
                    severity: 'ERROR'
                },
                ]
            );
            moveToNextStep = false;
            return false;
        }
    }
}
// Address validations end	

var businessInfoModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGAccountBusinessInfo');
var businessInfoRow = businessInfoModel.data[0];
var employeeInfoModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGEmployeeInfo');
var Model = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGAuthorizedRepresentative');
var partyModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGParty');
var partyRow = partyModel.data[0];
if(partyRow.genesis__Application__c.genesis__Asset_Class__c != 'Treasury Services'){
var collateralOwnerModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGCollateralOwner');
var collData = [];
collateralOwnerModel.data.forEach(function (colDataObj){
    if(!collateralOwnerModel.isRowMarkedForDeletion(colDataObj) && colDataObj.clcommon__Collateral__c){
        collData.push(colDataObj);
    }
});
collateralOwnerModel.data = collData;

}

if(!newPartyRow.clcommon__Type__c){
    return displayMessage('Select Party Type for Party.','ERROR');
}

var partyArgs = {};
if(newContactRow && newContactRow.LastName){
    partyArgs[0] = newContactModel;

    /*if(newContactRow.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c === undefined || newContactRow.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c === '') {
        return displayMessage('Select Legal Entity Type for Contact.','ERROR');
    }*/
}else{
    partyArgs[0] = null;
}
if(newAccountRow && newAccountRow.Name) {
    partyArgs[1] = newAccountModel;

    /*if(newAccountRow.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c === undefined || newAccountRow.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c === '') {
        return displayMessage('Select Legal Entity Type for Account.','ERROR');
    }*/
}
else {
    partyArgs[1] = null;
}
if(customSettingsRow.clcommon__Copy_Common_Address_To_Standard_Address__c)
    partyArgs[2] = addressModel;
else
    partyArgs[2] = null;

var bModel = businessInfoModel;
if (Object.keys(businessInfoModel.data[0]).length <= 2){
    bModel = null;
}

if(partyRow.genesis__Asset_Class__c !=null && partyRow.genesis__Asset_Class__c !=undefined && partyRow.genesis__Asset_Class__r.clcommon__Asset_Category__c == 'Treasury Services') {
    
    var eInfoModel = null;
    var wireAuthRepModel = null;
    var wireFinAcc = skuid.page.params.wireFinAcc;
    var sourcePage = skuid.page.params.sourcePage;
    var parentAppId = partyRow.genesis__Application__c;
    var partyAssetClass = new Array();
    partyAssetClass.push(partyRow.genesis__Asset_Class__c);
    if(employeeInfoModel.data.length>0) {
									   
        
        if(wireFinAcc) {
            wireAuthRepModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGAuthorizedRepresentative');
        }
    }
    
    // Username validation
    var validatUserName = false;
    $.each(employeeInfoModel.data ,function(i,row){
        eInfoModel = employeeInfoModel
        if(row.genesis__Is_Administrator__c != undefined && row.genesis__Is_Administrator__c == true){
            if(row.genesis__UserName__c == undefined  || row.genesis__UserName__c == '' || (row.genesis__UserName__c).trim() == '') {
                validatUserName = true;
            }
        }
    });
    
    if(validatUserName) {
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: 'Required Field(s) have no Value [UUX Username]',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        $.unblockUI();
        skuid.$('.nx-wizard-step .ui-button:visible').has('.ui-button-text:contains(Save)').button('enable');
        return false;
    }
    var validatLockboxUser = false;
    $.each(employeeInfoModel.data ,function(i,row){
        if(row.genesis__Lockbox_Administrator__c != undefined && row.genesis__Lockbox_Administrator__c == true){
            if(row.genesis__Lockbox_Username__c == undefined  || row.genesis__Lockbox_Username__c == '' || (row.genesis__Lockbox_Username__c).trim() == '') {
                validatLockboxUser = true;
            }
        }
    });
    
    if(validatLockboxUser) {
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: 'Required Field(s) have no Value [Lockbox Username]',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        $.unblockUI();
        skuid.$('.nx-wizard-step .ui-button:visible').has('.ui-button-text:contains(Save)').button('enable');
        return false;
    }

    var res = saveTreasuryPartyV3(newPartyModel,partyArgs[0],partyArgs[1],partyArgs[2],bModel,null,eInfoModel,wireAuthRepModel,parentAppId,partyAssetClass);
    
    $.unblockUI();
    var resObj = JSON.parse(res);
    
    if(resObj.status == 'SUCCESS') {
        showSuccessfullySavedMessage('#EditPartyTitlePanel');
        if(wireFinAcc) {
            setTimeout(function(){        
                closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({iframeIds: [sourcePage]});
            },1500);
 	}
        else if (sourcePage === 'TreasuryStatementServicesPage'){
           closeTopLevelDialog();
        }
        else {
            setTimeout(function(){        
                closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({divIds: [sourcePage]});
            },1500);
        }

        
        return;
    }
    else {
        $("#PartySaveButton").button('enable');
        return displayMessage(resObj.errorMessage,'ERROR');
    }
}

else {
    var res = savePartyV3(newPartyModel,partyArgs[0],partyArgs[1],partyArgs[2],bModel,null,collateralOwnerModel);
    var resObj = JSON.parse(res);
    if(resObj.status == 'SUCCESS'){
        displayMessage('Record is successfully saved!','INFO');
        
        var nGPartyModelToRefresh = skuid.model.getModel("NGParty");
        
        if(nGPartyModelToRefresh !== undefined) {
            nGPartyModelToRefresh.updateData();
        }
        
        var partiesContactModelToRefresh = skuid.model.getModel("PartiesContact");
        
        if(partiesContactModelToRefresh !== undefined) {
            partiesContactModelToRefresh.updateData();
        }
        
        var addressModelToRefresh = skuid.model.getModel("AddressModel");
        
        if(addressModelToRefresh !== undefined) {
            addressModelToRefresh.updateData();
        }
        
        return;
    }else{
        $("#PartySaveButton").button('enable');
        return displayMessage(resObj.errorMessage,'ERROR');

    }
}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateACHNameWireName" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
function errorMessage(errMessage){
    var pageTitle = $('#EditPartyTitlePanel');
    var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
    editor.clearMessages();
    editor.handleMessages(
    [{
        message: errMessage,
        severity: 'ERROR'
    }]
  );
}

var partyModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGParty');
var partyRow = partyModel.data[0];

if(partyRow.genesis__Application__c.genesis__Asset_Class__c != 'Treasury Services'){
    var businessInfoModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGAccountBusinessInfo');
    var contactModel=skuid.model.getModel('EditNGPartyContact');
    var accountModel= skuid.model.getModel('EditNGPartyAccount');
    var businessInfoRow = businessInfoModel.data[0];
    var models=[accountModel,contactModel,businessInfoModel];
    var editor = $('#EditPartyTitlePanel').data('object').editor;
    if(validateAllRequiredFields($,editor,models)  === false)
    {
        return false;
    }
    var regex = /^[A-Za-z0-9 ]+$/;
    var sourcepage=skuid.page.params.sourcePage;
    if(skuid.page.params.sourcePage == 'TreasuryACHPage')
    {
        if(!regex.test(businessInfoRow.genesis__ACH_Name__c.trim()))
        {
            errorMessage('Special Characters are not allowed in ACH Name');
            return false;
        }
    }
    else if(skuid.page.params.sourcePage == 'TreasuryWiresPage' ){
        if(!regex.test(businessInfoRow.genesis__Wire_Name__c.trim()))
        {
            errorMessage('Special Characters are not allowed in Wire Name');
            return false;
        }
    }

}
$.blockUI({
    message: 'Saving...',
});
return true;</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ownershipPercentageAssignment" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var RelationshipModel = skuid.model.getModel('RelationshipModel');
var RelationshipModelRow = RelationshipModel.data[0];
var partyModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGParty');
var partyModelRow = partyModel.data[0];
var ownershipPercentageMap = new Map();
$.each(partyModel.getRows(),function(i,row){
            ownershipPercentageMap.set(row.clcommon__Type__r.Name, row.clcommon__Percent_Ownership__c);
            });
if(ownershipPercentageMap.has('BENEFICIAL OWNER')){
    RelationshipModel.updateRow(RelationshipModelRow,
                            {'clcommon__Ownership_Percentage__c' : ownershipPercentageMap.get('BENEFICIAL OWNER'),
                                                                    
                        });
    if(!RelationshipModel.hasChanged){
        partyModel.updateData();
        RelationshipModel.updateData();
    }
}

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="loadModels" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    var paramId = skuid.page.params.id;
	    var dealAppParamModel = skuid.model.getModel('DealAppParam');
	    
	    var pageName = undefined;
	    
	    if(dealAppParamModel && dealAppParamModel.data.length>0){
	        pageName = dealAppParamModel.data[0].PageName;
	    }
	    if(pageName && pageName == 'AddDealsToPackage'){
	        var selectedProductModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedProduct');
            var selectedProductRow = selectedProductModel.data[0];
	        var sql = "SELECT Id, Name, DeveloperName, SobjectType FROM RecordType where Name = \'" + selectedProductRow.RecordType.Name + "\' AND SobjectType  = 'genesis__Applications__c' ";
            var result = sforce.connection.query(sql);
            var recordsArr = result.getArray('records');
	        var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication').createRow({
	             additionalConditions: [{ field: 'genesis__Parent_Application__c', value: paramId },
	             { field: 'RecordTypeId', value: recordsArr[0].Id },
	             { field: 'genesis__Product_Type__c' , value : 'LOAN'},
	             //Custom Added by Subham starts----
	             { field: 'genesis__Pricing_Method__c', value : 'RATE CARD'}]
	             //Custom Added by Subham ends------
	        });
	    } else{
    	    if(paramId){
        	    queryApplication(paramId);
        	}else{
        	    var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication').createRow({
        	        additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'RecordTypeId', value: skuid.page.params.RecordType},
                         { field: 'genesis__Product_Type__c' , value : 'LOAN'},
                         //Custom Added by Subham starts----
        	             { field: 'genesis__Pricing_Method__c', value : 'RATE CARD'}
        	             //Custom Added by Subham ends------
        	             ]
        	    });
        	}
	    }
	});
})(skuid);

function queryApplication(id){
    var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication');
    var appIdCondition = applicationModel.getConditionByName('AppId');
    applicationModel.setCondition(appIdCondition,id);
    skuid.model.updateData([applicationModel],function(){});
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="fieldsRenderMode" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
value = arguments[1];
var renderMode = skuid.page.params.mode;

skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].read(field, value);
}else{
skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].edit(field, value);
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="getIncludedPageData" cachelocation="false" url="">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
var productRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanCLProduct').getFirstRow();
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication');
var ApplicationOldValues = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationOldValues');
if(applicationModel && applicationModel.data && applicationModel.data[0] && productRow){
applicationModel.data[0].genesis__CL_Product__c = productRow.Id;
}
var result = {
'genesis__Applications__c' : applicationModel,
'ApplicationOldValues' : ApplicationOldValues,
};

return result;

</jsitem>

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="convert" cachelocation="false">var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');
var appRow = appModel.data[0];
try {
    var ret = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ConvertApplicationCtrl','convertApplicationToContract',
    {
        appId : appRow.Id
    });
    alert(ret);
    if(!ret.includes('Application is converted to contract successfully'))
        return;
    appModel.updateRow(appRow, {genesis__Status__c: 'APPROVED - CONVERTED TO CONTRACT' });
    appModel.save();

    document.getElementById('loan-details-iframe').contentWindow.location.reload(true);
    var arrowEle = document.getElementsByClassName("sk-dropnav-arrow")[0];
            arrowEle.classList.add("shift-arrow-to-right");

} catch(err) {
    alert(err);

}



</jsitem>

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="providerOnLoad" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var integrationProvider = skuid.model.getModel('IntegrationProviderModel').data;
var providerUIModel = skuid.model.getModel('IntegrationProviderUIModel');
$.each(integrationProvider,function(i,row){
    let familyName = row.intframework__Integration_Family__r.Name;
    if (familyName == 'Consumer Credit') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isFicoActive : true
        });
    }else if (familyName == 'UCC') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isUCCActive : true
        });
    } else if (familyName == 'Documents And Disclosures') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isDocumentsAndDisclosures : true
        });
    } else if(familyName == 'KYC') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isKYCActive : true
        });
    } else if(familyName == 'KYB') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isKYBActive : true
        });
    }  else if(familyName == 'E Sign') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isESignActive : true
        });
	}
		else if(familyName == 'Corporate Information') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isCorporateInformationActive : true
        });
    }
});</jsitem>

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="reLoadPolicyCondition" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

//Update Policy Conditions New Page model
var policyConditionsEnhancedModel = skuid.model.getModel('PolicyException');
if (policyConditionsEnhancedModel !== undefined) {
    policyConditionsEnhancedModel.updateData();
}

setTimeout(function(){ 

    var policyConditionModel = skuid.model.getModel('PolicyException');
    var policyConditionValue;
    $.each(policyConditionModel.data, function(i, row) {
        var j = i+1;
        policyConditionValue = document.querySelector("#policyTable > div.nx-editor-contents > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(" + j + ") > td:nth-child(6) > div > div");
        
        if (policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "Exception" ||
        policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "Rejected") {
        policyConditionValue.classList.add("red-textbox");//red color
        } else if(policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "In File" ||
            policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "Pending" ) {
            policyConditionValue.classList.add("amber-textbox");//amber color
        }
        else {
            policyConditionValue.classList.add("blue-textbox");//blue color
        }
    });

}, 1000);</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="updateApplicationOnPopup">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
var message = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "{{$Label.genesis__Save_Application}}");

$.blockUI({
    message: message,
    onBlock:function(){
        saveApplication();
    }
});	
function saveApplication(){
    var applicationM = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');
    var applicationData = applicationM.data[0];
    var newAppParams = {};
    var paramsMap = {};
    newAppParams.applicationM = applicationM;
    newAppParams.pmtstreamM = null;
    newAppParams.businessM = null;
    newAppParams.addressM = null;
    newAppParams.personalInfoM = null;
    newAppParams.accountM = null;
    newAppParams.contactM = null;
    newAppParams.changeDate = false;
    newAppParams.generateSchedule = false;
    
    paramsMap.generateSchedule = true;
    paramsMap.AddFeeToLoanAmount = true;
    newAppParams.mapForParameters = paramsMap;
    
    var result = saveNGApplicationV3(newAppParams);
    applicationData.updateApplication = false;
    $.unblockUI();
    location.reload();
}
</jsitem>

var skuidPage = jsonData.apiSpecificUIPageName;

openTopLevelDialog({
    title: title,
    iframeUrl: iframeUrl
});</jsitem>

	$ = skuid.$;
	
var message = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "Please Wait While The Loan Is Booked To Core...");
$.blockUI({
message: message,
onBlock:function(){
BookCIFToCore();
}
});	
	
function BookCIFToCore(){
    var scModels = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');
    var scRow = scModels.data[0];
    var result = sforce.apex.execute('NLSBookToCoreCIFCalloutClass','bookToCoreCIFFromBackEnd',
        {
            applicationId : scRow.Id,
        });
    console.log(result);
    if(result == 'Success'){
        BookLoanToCore();
    }
    else{
        alert('Result: ' + result);
    }
}
function BookLoanToCore(){
    var scModels = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');
    var scRow = scModels.data[0];
    var result = sforce.apex.execute('NLSBookToCoreCalloutClass','bookToCoreLoanFromBackEnd',
    {
        applicationId : scRow.Id,
    });
    console.log(result);
    if(result != 'Success'){
        //alert('Result: ' + result);
        return displayMessage(result);
    }
    skuid.model.updateData([scModels],function(){
        $.unblockUI();
    });
}


var displayMessage = function (message) {
        console.log('error');
         $('#ExceptionHeader').data('object').editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: message,
            }
        ]);
        $.unblockUI();
        return false;
    };</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="generateModificationAgreeMaturity">var params = arguments[0],

ui-button iconic-button iconic-button-edit ui-state-focushtml {
    height: 100%;
}

body {
    background-color: #EBEEF0;
    font: normal normal 400 12px Lato;
    padding: 0 !important;
    height: 100%;
}

body > .nx-page {
    padding: 0;
    background-color: #EBEEF0;
}

.cls-dashboard-tab-content {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

.cls-dashboard-tab-content .ui-tabs-nav {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    height: 40px;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

.cls-dashboard-tab-content > div.ui-tabs-panel {
    position: absolute;
    top: 46px;
    bottom: 6px;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-dashboard-grid {
    margin: 0 !important;
}

#loan-panel {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 40%;
    margin: 0 !important;
}

#loan-right-panel {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 40%;
    right: 0;
    margin: 0 0 0 10px !important;
}

#loan-panel .cls-dashboard-section {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-panel .cls-dashboard-section .wrapper-title {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-panel .cls-dashboard-section .wrapper-container {
    position: absolute;
    top: 65px;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-panel .cls-dashboard-section .wrapper-container div {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-dashboard-document-section{
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 50%;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-dashboard-parties-section {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    margin: 0 !important;
}

#loan-dashboard-document-section div,
#loan-dashboard-parties-section div {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#relationship-dashboard,
#collateral-tab,
#construction-tab,
#approvals-dashboard{
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    margin: 0 !important;
}

#construction-help {
    position: absolute;
    top: -42px;
    right: 10px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 28px;
    border: none !important;
}

#loan-details-iframe,
#document-iframe,
#party-iframe {
    border: none;
}

div[pagename="NGLoanDashBoard"] {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    overflow-y: hidden;
}

#skuid-component-tab-cls-originate-page-3 {
    overflow-y:scroll;
}

#skuid-component-tab-cls-originate-page-5 {
    overflow:hidden;
}

#skuid-component-tab-cls-originate-page-6 {
    overflow-y:scroll;
}

#skuid-component-tab-cls-originate-page-7 {
    overflow-y:scroll;
}

#skuid-component-tab-cls-originate-page-9 {
    overflow-y:scroll;
}

#skuid-component-tab-cls-originate-page-11 {
    overflow-y:scroll;
}

    background: white;
}
